titleStmt.title: The tragicall death of Sophinisba. Written by Dauid Murray. Scoto-Brittaine
titleStmt.author: Murray, David, Sir, 1567-1629.
Murray, David, Sir, 1567-1629. Complaint of the shepheard Harpalus. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by George Eld] for Iohn Smethwick, and are to be sold at his shop in Saint Dunstans Church-yard in Fleetstreet, vnder the Diall,

notesStmt.note: Includes a reprint of his: The complaint of the shepheard Harpalus.
"Cælia. Containing certaine sonets" has separate divisional title; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
